Txt_Talk_Muor_Out_MAIN_0_SCENE_0000_000_.Text: *: I struggle to count many moons that pass since you last came! Wait...
*: This is not friend Peredvizhnik! Look very much like him, but there is pittance of difference.
*: Yes, I seeing resemblance very clear.
*: Please, take my apology. Father's eyesight is not in old way of being.
*: Forgive me, kind visitor. I hope you have restorative time in our village.

Txt_Talk_Muor_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_010_1.Text: *: This place village of Mur. Village in end of world. Welcome to you, friend.

Txt_Talk_Muor_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_010_1.Text: *: You have come to here by boat?

Txt_Talk_Muor_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_010_2.Text: *: You have come to here by boat?

Txt_Talk_Muor_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_010_3.Text: *: Ha! I knew it to be so! I am clever old devil!

Txt_Talk_Muor_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_010_4.Text: *: You have not? Then how? You walk? Hahaha! How very whimsical!

Txt_Talk_Muor_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_010_5.Text: *: You have not? Then how? You walk? Hahaha! How very whimsical!

Txt_Talk_Muor_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0310_010_1.Text: *: Yoy! Peredvizhnik! You have returned to us!

Txt_Talk_Muor_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0310_010_2.Text: *: ...Is what I would say were you real Peredvizhnik. You are close, but not quite right.

Txt_Talk_Muor_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0310_010_5.Text: *: Ah, traveller. Is not often we welcome your kind.

Txt_Talk_Muor_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0310_010_6.Text: *: Your appearance resembles someone I know. Ah, but you should neglect what I said.

Txt_Talk_Muor_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0310_020_1.Text: *: You know, Peredvizhnik was man of small words, but golden heart.

Txt_Talk_Muor_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0310_020_2.Text: *: He often talk of his darling <IfGender_HERO(son,daughter,)>. I think he gave us love he meant for child.

Txt_Talk_Muor_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0310_020_3.Text: *: Once, I fell and started crying. He came to give me comfort until I feel better.

Txt_Talk_Muor_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410_010_1.Text: *: Long time before, I was insubstantial in my strength, but Peredvizhnik make me want get bigger. Now look at me!

Txt_Talk_Muor_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410_010_3.Text: *: Hm? Your faces are not known to me.

Txt_Talk_Muor_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410_010_4.Text: *: It is not frequently that travellers come to here. Greetings.

Txt_Talk_Muor_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410_020_1.Text: *: Significant while ago, brutish monster came and attacked village.

Txt_Talk_Muor_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410_020_2.Text: *: Of course, was no match for Peredvizhnik. But some whiles later, Peredvizhnik left Mur. I remember his face full of worry.

Txt_Talk_Muor_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410_020_3.Text: *: Hm? Your faces are not known to me.

Txt_Talk_Muor_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410_020_4.Text: *: It is not frequently that travellers come to here. Greetings.

Txt_Talk_Muor_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0520_010_1.Text: *: Hello to you. It is beautiful evening, no, friend? So beautiful that it makes one erupt into song!

Txt_Talk_Muor_Market_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110.Text: *: Yoy! You are visitor who mistook for Peredvizhnik!
*: There is no coincidence on you being here. Please spend a time at our village full of great relaxation.

Txt_Talk_Muor_Market_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210.Text: *: Would elate me to see him once more...
*: My heart is always full of wondering about when his arrival could occur.

Txt_Talk_Muor_Market_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0220.Text: *: Yoy, look on the hour! Is time I succumbed to rest.

Txt_Talk_Muor_Market_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0310.Text: *: Here is helmet Peredvizhnik left to us.
*: Was in way of distress, so I fixed it for Peredvizhnik to make happy when he return.
*: My boy Petya's missing of him is extraordinary.
*: Oh, you appear like traveller. Mur is village of absolute nothing, but please, to make yourself as if in your own home!

Txt_Talk_Muor_Market_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0320.Text: *: Hello to you. It is beautiful evening. I gaze stars wondering if friend Peredvizhnik is at wit's beginning enjoying home life.
*: Oh, you appear like traveller. Mur is village of absolute nothing, but please, to make yourself as if in your own home!

Txt_Talk_Muor_Market_1F_SearchObj_Ortega.Text: {LEADER} takes a long, hard look at the helmet sitting on the counter.
It looks extremely sturdy, and has been restored to gleaming perfection.
*: Pardon me, but that not for selling.
*: It was disremembered by someone long ago.

Txt_Talk_Muor_Market_1F_SUB_0_SCENE_0610.Text: *: Yoy, I should reveal I hear everything you say to Petya.
*: My surprise was great to know you originate of kingdom Aliahan.
*: Because keeper of this helmet, Peredvizhnik, have same origins.
*: Actually, I have favour to entrust on you...
*: Please! Other options are all absent.
*: Peredvizhnik say he have wife and child reside in Aliahan.
*: Child must be aged same like you now.
*: Any juvenile ones like you in Aliahan may be property of Peredvizhnik. Could help in searching him.
Something on the back of the helm catches {HERO}'s eye.
<6>May victory smile upon you, Great Hero of Aliahan<9>
This appears to be none other than Ortega's helm!

Txt_Talk_Muor_Market_1F_SUB_0_VOLUME_071.Text: *: Yoy, hello again! My remorse continue for thinking you were friend Peredvizhnik.
*: ...You want me tell many tales of his?
*: This would please me very much. Without friend Peredvizhnik, there is no Mur.
*: I think back to when Petya was insignificant child.
Grandfather! Man who is wearing strange helmet collapsed in outside!
*: Yoy, you must summon your father!
*: Back in land of lively now?
*: No, no. Stable is best. Rest is medicine for you now.
*: He speaks of truth. Stay on our village until you are right in the rain.
*: But when friend Peredvizhnik was still unhealed, monster came to Mur...
*: Even so, friend Peredvizhnik stood to beast and maintained village's dignity.
*: This is story of why we are in bond to friend Peredvizhnik.

Txt_Talk_Muor_Market_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110.Text: *: Long time ago, I once conversed Peredvizhnik.
*: He would always speak in pain of leaving infant <IfGender_HERO(son,daughter,)> in home far away from here...
*: I recall his wounds were not yet shut on day of departing. Yoy, where is he existing now?
*: When Peredvizhnik was existing here, oh how he coddled little Petya...
*: Welcome to village of Mur. Shall I sing song on honour of your arrival?

Txt_Talk_Muor_Market_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210.Text: *: Yoy, Petya was incorrigible young scamp!
*: Forever sneaking from village to play outside! Such unruliness!
*: But it is thanks to this that unconscious Peredvizhnik was found, and rescued back to village.
*: Hello to you, traveller. Do not stay in the outside for too long. Is most horrible cold.

Txt_Talk_Muor_Market_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0220.Text: *: Yoy, what could be entertaining friend Peredvizhnik these days?

Txt_Talk_Muor_Market_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210.Text: *: Petya grown into splendid young man despite black past of misbehavings.
*: Now his dream is to make pilgrimage to village of Aliahan where Peredvizhnik call home.

Txt_Talk_Muor_Market_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410.Text: You know, my father said Peredvizhnik's helmet is one of kind.
I strictly polish every day in desire that his return is unavoidable.
Perhaps I can go for trip to locate Peredvizhnik's person.

Txt_Talk_Muor_Market_2F_SUB_0_VOLUME_061.Text: I am Petya. You have appearance of traveller.
Then might know friend Peredvizhnik! Is this name one you know?
He is great man who travelled here from mysterious village Aliahan.
So great he once helped unfortunate boy like me.
What is happening!? I am afraid!
*: Yoy, your wounds still opened wide! And you cannot fight alone!
This is my burden to bear, not yours!
While after, friend Peredvizhnik departed and that was last we watched him.
So long even had time for repairing his disremembered helm...
If you collide onto him in travels, please tell him everyone here is very aware of his absence.

Txt_Talk_Muor_House1_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110.Text: *: Privet. If it is Petya who you are seeking, young man can be located at marketplace.

Txt_Talk_Muor_House1_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0120.Text: *: Yoy, my darling Petya loves Peredvizhnik so! He speaks of him even in his sleep!
*: He must be full with delight that great man as Peredvizhnik befriended insignificant boy like him.

Txt_Talk_Muor_Out_SUB_0_VOLUME_0010_010_.Text: {LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...
